Don’t — with a —

Based on this song by Azealia Banks and Diplo*. I wanted to make a T-shirt of it, but I didn’t have the guts to purchase and wear anything with cuss words, so I made a censored version.

Both versions are still available as prints: Fresh and Clean.

* I made this shirt/design way before I found out Azealia Banks had a habit of being a bigot :(

Mar 1 2013
